message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that could be incredibly valuable for your business.  I understand you may not know the full potential of this product yet, so I'm willing to offer it to you for a price that I believe reflects its worth. My asking price is $1000000. I'm confident that this product will more than pay for itself in the long run. If you're interested, we can schedule a time to discuss this further and answer any questions you might have.
